NovraDeviceCommunicationsLibrary Documentation

Introduction

The Novra Device Communications Library is intended as a developer resource for customers who wish to write their own control applications.  The library is currently available in three forms.

  • static Linux library
  • static Windows library
  • Windows DLL
The current library supports the following Novra devices.
  • S75 Version 2.x
  • S75 Version 3
  • S75V (aka Version 5, aka PesMaker)
  • A75
  • A75 PesMaker
  • S75 JLeo
  • S75+
  • S75CA (Conditional Access)
  • S75FK (Fixed Key)
  • S75+ Pro
  • S75CA Pro
  • S75FK Pro
This documentation provides descriptions for all the functions and structures that make up the API (access using the links at the top of the page) as well as programming guidelines and building instructions.
